title: Hidden Worlds
overview: The events revolve around a famous journalist and novelist, who is very attached to his family and loves to spend a lot of time with them. A number of important documents fall into the hands of this writer, which are related to the betrayal and corruption of a number of officials in the state, which prompts him to publish these documents, which leads him into major crises and problems, which may His life and the life of his family are in danger.
